facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population below international poverty line (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population living below the extreme poverty line was approximately 0.7 % in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Employed population below international poverty line, by sex and age (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, 0.2 % of the country's workers and their families were living on less than 1.90 US dollars per person per day

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population living below the national poverty line (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of population living below the national poverty line declined from 22.7 % in 2002 to 4.1% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2015 , Sri Lanka has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Prevalence of undernourishment (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population suffering from hunger was 10.9 % in 2016 .

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children moderately or severely stunted (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, 17.3 % of children under age 5 had stunted growth

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children moderately or severely overweight (%)
facts.fact_text: The share of overweight children under age 5 increased from 1.0 % in 2000 to 2.0% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Maternal mortality ratio
facts.fact_text: The maternal mortality ratio decreased from 75 per 100,000 live births in 1990 to 30 per 100,000 live births in 2015 .

facts.seriesTitle: Under-five mortality rate, by sex (deaths per 1,000 live births)
facts.fact_text: The mortality rate of children under age 5 fell from 16.5 per 1,000 live births in 2000 to 8.8 per 1,000 live births in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population, by sex and age (per 1,000 uninfected population)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , there were about 0.01 people in every 100,000 uninfected population that became newly infected with HIV.

facts.seriesTitle: Mortality rate attributed to cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease (probability)
facts.fact_text: The risk of dying between the ages of 30 and 70 from one of four main non-communicable diseases (NCDs) - cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease - fell from 21.5 % in 2000 to 17.4% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of women aged 20-24 years who were married or in a union before age 18 (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2007, 11.8 % of women aged 20 to 24 reported that they were married before their eighteenth birthday

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments (% of total number of seats)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of seats held by women in single or lower houses of parliament increased from 4.8889 % in 2000 to 5.7778% in 2018.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with access to electricity, by urban/rural (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population with access to electricity increased from 69.59 % in 2000 to 95.59% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , 28 % of the population relied primarily on clean fuels and technology.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita, by type of raw material (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption increased from 3.08162 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 5.14398 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Unemployment rate, by sex and age (%)
facts.fact_text: The total unemployment rate declined from 7.7 % in 2000 to 4.2% in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita (%)
facts.fact_text: The annual growth rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) per capita declined from 5.34 % in 2000 to 2.92% in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP (kilogrammes of CO2 per constant 2010 United States dollars)
facts.fact_text: The carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP decreased from 0.1 kilograms in 2000 to 0.09 kilograms in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Research and development expenditure as a proportion of GDP (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2015 , investment in research and development (R&D) stood at 0.11 % of GDP , a decline from 0.14 % in 2000

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 99.72 % of the population was in range of at least a second-generation (2G) cellular signal

facts.seriesTitle: Labour share of GDP, comprising wages and social protection transfers (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2012, 54.0 % of GDP was from labour, comprising wages and social protection transfers

facts.seriesTitle: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter in cities, urban population (micrograms per cubic meter)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , the annual population-weighted average mean concentration of fine suspended particles of less than 2.5 microns in diameters (PM2.5) was about 15.2494812011719 micrograms per cubic metre . This is above the maximum level for safety set by WHO of 10 micrograms per cubic metre.

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2015 , Sri Lanka has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita, by type of raw material (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption increased from 3.08162 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 5.14398 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2015 , Sri Lanka has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Coverage of protected areas in relation to marine areas (Exclusive Economic Zones) (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2018 , 0.07463 % of the marine environment under national jurisdiction (up to 200 nautical miles from shore) was under protection.

facts.seriesTitle: Forest area as a proportion of total land area (%)
facts.fact_text: Land area covered by forest declined from 34.95455 % in 2000 to 33.00909% in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of Freshwater Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of freshwater key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 40.63612 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of Terrestrial Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 43.67398 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population, by sex (victims per 100,000 population)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , the intentional homicide rate was 2.55 per 100,000 population .

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority (% of children under 5 years of age)
facts.fact_text: In 2007 , there were about 97.2 % of children under age 5 whose births were registered with a civil authority

facts.seriesTitle: Volume of remittances (in United States dollars) as a proportion of total GDP (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , the inflow of personal remittances was 8.92 % of GDP , up from 4.99 % in 1990

facts.seriesTitle: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services (%)
facts.fact_text: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services increased from 14.82 % in 1990 to 16.53% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Fixed Internet broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants, by speed (per 100 inhabitants)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , fixed-broadband internet penetration reached 5.85 % of the population , up from nearly no coverage in 2001 .

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with national statistical plans that are fully funded (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2018 , Sri Lanka does not have national statistical plans that are fully funded.
